subject: Equipment based monitoring of the projects during O&M phase.
text: IRay <7ty TTTHTifgifetorut 349 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (4st 4Rdr7 a {TTANf AATTt4) 447 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) T-5 & 6, daer-10 , &RaT, # fert-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Operation & Maintenance/2021 Policy Guidelines No. 9.4.23/2021 dated March, 2021 (Decision taken on e-file Comp. No.57441) Sub: Equipment based monitoring of the projects during O&M phase. Consultancy Contracts during the O&M phase have a provision of equipment based monitoring of the highways at specified frequencies. It has been observed that during the O&M phase, the project monitoring is not being carried out by use of equipment such as Network Survey Vehicle, FWD, MBIU, Retro Reflectometer, ATCC etc_ at the specified frequencies. 2 _ The details of the    penalties on the Consultants for not undertaking the equipment based monitoring in the prescribed months have been detailed under Para 6.2 (d) & (e) of General Conditions of Contract (relevant extracts enclosed) . 10% penalty per month shall also be imposed for delay in use of equipment: In case one or more equipment is not used during next 3 months of survey month, this shall be treated as Breach of Contract and the performance security shall be liable to be forfeited. 3_ In view of above, ROs and PDs are advised to comply with the provisions of the contract conditions and take appropriate action on the consultants in case of default: 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
